name: The Book Of Forbidden Knowledge
description:
A Game made in 48h during the McGameJam 2019 By : 

- Catherine Bazinet

- Maxime Charland

- Roxanne Corbeil

- Ronan Le Gall

- Alexis Maher

This game is best played with one player reading the book and another player describing the creature and casting the spells.

You need to work as a team to defeat all the monsters and escape out of this dungeon.

BEWARE : This game was made to be played with the book (Or the PDF included in the download) and the glove to cast magic.

If you are trying it online, you can use the Arrow keys to make it work
